turtles.name: Red-eared Slider with Bunny Hat
turtles.description: A medium-sized Red-eared Slider turtle wearing a charming white knitted hat with bunny ears. The turtle has a dark, patterned shell with visible scutes and subtle yellow/light green markings. Dark green/olive skin with prominent yellow stripes on head, neck, and legs. Characteristic red patch behind eyes.

characteristics.shell_color: Dark patterned shell with yellow/light green markings
characteristics.skin_color: Dark green/olive with prominent yellow stripes
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Red patch behind eyes, bunny hat accessory, yellow stripes

aquarium_setup.basking_area: Large basking platform with UVB lighting

feeding.diet: Commercial turtle pellets, vegetables, occasional protein
feeding.feeding_schedule: Daily feeding for juveniles, every other day for adults
feeding.food_types: Turtle pellets, leafy greens, aquatic plants, insects
feeding.special_notes: Remove uneaten food to maintain water quality

environment.basking_spot: Warm basking area with proper temperature gradient
environment.substrate: Large river rocks or bare bottom

health.disease_prevention: Clean water, proper diet, UVB lighting
health.common_issues: Shell rot, respiratory infections, vitamin deficiencies
health.signs_of_illness: Lethargy, loss of appetite, shell abnormalities

turtles.image_description: Red-eared Slider turtle wearing white bunny hat on tatami mat

turtles.name: Turtle with Pink Hat
turtles.description: A small turtle wearing a soft, pastel pink knitted hat with ties under the chin. Dark, possibly black or very dark brown shell with distinct scutes and growth rings. Mottled greenish-brown skin with texture and wrinkles around the neck. Small, dark eyes with gentle expression.

characteristics.shell_color: Dark brown/black shell with distinct scutes
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Pink knitted hat, dark shell, textured skin

feeding.feeding_schedule: Daily feeding for juveniles, every other day for adults
feeding.food_types: Turtle pellets, leafy greens, aquatic plants
feeding.special_notes: Remove uneaten food to maintain water quality

turtles.image_description: Small turtle wearing pink knitted hat on woven fabric

turtles.name: Red-eared Slider with Eye Issues
turtles.description: A Red-eared Slider turtle with characteristic yellow and black shell patterns and red patches behind eyes. However, both eyes appear swollen, cloudy, and possibly closed with a milky film, suggesting potential health issues such as infection or Vitamin A deficiency.

characteristics.shell_color: Dark green/brown with yellow and black patterns
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Red patches behind eyes, yellow shell patterns, eye health issues

aquarium_setup.basking_area: Large basking platform with UVB lighting

feeding.diet: Commercial turtle pellets, vegetables, vitamin supplements
feeding.feeding_schedule: Daily feeding with vitamin A supplementation
feeding.food_types: Turtle pellets, leafy greens, aquatic plants, vitamin supplements
feeding.special_notes: May need vitamin A supplementation for eye health

environment.substrate: Large river rocks or bare bottom

health.disease_prevention: Clean water, proper diet, UVB lighting
health.common_issues: Eye infections, vitamin A deficiency, shell rot
health.signs_of_illness: Cloudy eyes, lethargy, loss of appetite
health.veterinary_care: Immediate veterinary care for eye issues

special_care.vitamin_supplementation: Vitamin A supplementation may be needed
special_care.water_quality: Excellent water quality essential for recovery

turtles.image_description: Red-eared Slider turtle with eye health issues on wooden floor

turtles.name: Turtle in Hand
turtles.description: A medium-sized turtle being held securely in a person's hand. Dark green/olive skin with distinctive bright yellow stripes on face and neck. Mottled shell with greens, browns, and grays with clearly defined scutes and growth rings. Small red object visible near chin.

turtles.name: Red-eared Slider on Basking Platform
turtles.description: A Red-eared Slider turtle positioned on a dark rectangular basking platform in an aquarium. Rich, glossy dark brown/black shell with striking orange, red, and yellow patterns. Characteristic bright red patch behind eye. Head and neck extended, alert expression.

turtles.name: Leopard Pattern Turtle
turtles.description: A small, light-colored juvenile turtle with highly patterned carapace resembling leopard or giraffe pattern. Bright yellow/light cream base with irregular dark brown/black markings forming geometric shapes. Pale yellow/cream head and limbs with dark eyes.

turtles.name: Turtle on Animal Mat
turtles.description: A turtle with dark, mottled carapace in shades of brown, olive green, and yellowish areas. Light brown/olive skin with distinctive yellow/cream stripes running from behind eyes. Pointed snout, dark alert eyes. Positioned on white mat with animal patterns.
